name: variant_annotator
title: GATK VariantAnnotator
summary: Annotate a VCF file using GATK VariantAnnotator

inputSpec.name: variants_vcfgzs
inputSpec.label: VCF Files
inputSpec.help: An array of variant files to be annotated.

inputSpec.name: variants_vcfgztbis
inputSpec.label: VCF File Indices
inputSpec.help: An array of variant index files matched to the variant files.

inputSpec.name: genome_fastagz
inputSpec.label: Reference Genome

suggestions.name: DNAnexus Reference Genomes: Azure West US

inputSpec.help: The reference genome used during variant calling.

inputSpec.name: no_geno
inputSpec.label: Omit producing a VCF with sample information?
inputSpec.help: Do not produce an annotated VCF that contains sample information.

inputSpec.name: hdr_only
inputSpec.label: Output a sites-only VCF?
inputSpec.help: Create an annotated VCF that contains sites-only, no sample information.

inputSpec.name: cmd_params
inputSpec.label: VariantAnnotator Parameters
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Additional command line options to be passed to the GATK3 VariantAnnotator call.

outputSpec.name: vcf_out
outputSpec.label: Filtered VCF file
outputSpec.help: (Optional) An array of annotated variant files that include sample-level information.

outputSpec.name: vcfidx_out
outputSpec.label: Filtered VCF Index file
outputSpec.help: (Optional) An array of index files that match the sample-level variant files.

outputSpec.name: vcf_hdr_out
outputSpec.label: Filtered VCF Sites-only file
outputSpec.help: (Optional) An array of annotated variant files that are site-only and omit sample-level information.

outputSpec.name: vcfidx_hdr_out
outputSpec.label: Filtered VCF Sites-only Index file
outputSpec.help: (Optional) An array of index files that match the site-only variant files.

details.whatsNew: * 1.0.0 First version of the VariantAnnotator app.
